Color Choices

by Brijesh on July 11, 2015 Share on:

Any of the following color values can be used as the value of color in the front matter of the blog post.

grey

orange

yellow

amber

light-blue

lime

teal

black-87

blue-grey

brown

indigo

purple

deep-purple

red

pink
